TEI.2.document_title: Rovert Kuykendall to Stephen F Austin, 01-03-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Robert Kuykendall to Austin, January 3, 1830. Draft on Austin to pay tuition.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 316
